ygData.subject: Grouping and XP bonus
ygData.msgSnippet: I learned this weekend that there is a 25% XP bonus for groups of 6. I didn t believe it until my group added a 6th person, and our xp rate increased
ygData.messageBody:
I learned this weekend that there is a 25% XP bonus for groups of 6. I
didn't believe it until my group added a 6th person, and our xp rate
increased dramatically. The 6th person we added was AFK and just sat on a
rock the whole time. We were doing crocs and caimans in Oasis so the type of
creature didn't change. My buddy (also in the groupt) Petitioned a GM to get
the skinny on this. The GM wouldn't give out a figure, but did acknowledge
there is a bonus for total XP distributed in a party of 6.

This gives high level people incentive to get a group of 5 lower ranked
party members. That person will rake in the XP so long as they're killing
things that aren't too low for his/her level.



-----Original Message-----
From: jay schultze [mailto:sartori69@...]
Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 11:53 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Please give me a reason to play


From: "jay schultze" <sartori69@...>
This is from my viewpoint - a former beta-tester who hasn't jumped into
commercial yet, so correct any misinformation and I thank you in advance =)

You are 33 and people 3-5 levels above you won't group with you?!
WTF? They must not know that they will get xp (and plenty of it) with you
around. OK, I don't remember exactly the floor and ceiling limit for similar

level ppl to group. I know up to like 20th it's a 4 lvl above or below
limit. But after 20th things change. When I was 20th I was able to group
with a 26th level person and get xp. When I was 23 I was grouping with 30th
level ppl and getting xp. 3-5 level differences at your level will not put
any significant dent in anyone's xp gains. They are just being either
ignorant, or greedy. My 32nd lvl friend used to party with 40th lvl ppl all
the time.

Sartori of Kelethin
